description:
Precision application for all your weed and pest needs

With adjustable spray patterns, you get precise control for targeted application exactly where you need it.

sections.product_features:
Replacement weed and pest sprayer
Battery-powered for easy spray
Adjustable spray pattern for precise application
Works with Weed Warrior, Dandelion Doom, and Bug Doom
Easy-attach design
Ergonomic grip
Long-lasting performance
sections.whats_included: One (1) Powerhouse™ battery-powered wand sprayer. Sunday weed killer pouches and concentrates sold separately.
sections.instructions:
For best use with your Sunday concentrate products:
Remove the battery pull tab before first use
Attach wand sprayer to your Sunday concentrate pouch
Adjust spray pattern by turning the nozzle tip
Apply pressure to trigger for consistent spray
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
What Sunday products is this compatible with?
The Universal Wand Sprayer works with all Sunday concentrate systems including Weed Warrior, Dandelion Doom, and Bug Doom products. It attaches to the Sunday weed killer pouches and containers that come with these starter kits.
Do I need this if I already purchased a starter kit?
No, all Sunday starter kits already include a wand sprayer. This product is for replacement if your original sprayer is lost or damaged, or if you want an additional sprayer for convenience.
How long does the battery last?
The battery typically lasts for multiple applications. The sprayer is designed for intermittent use consistent with normal lawn and garden product application.
Can I purchase additional pouches separately?
Yes, the Sunday Weed Killer Pouch is available separately and can be used with this sprayer and any Sunday concentrate refills.
How do I clean and maintain the sprayer?
After each use, rinse the sprayer with clean water by spraying for 30 seconds. Store in a cool, dry place. Do not submerge the entire sprayer in water as this may damage the battery compartment.
